Hey {!Contact.FirstName},
Thanks for letting us know you're interested in NCS. Unfortunately, you’re not in the eligible age range to take part in NCS.
We have other opportunities for you, though!
- You can apply to work on NCS. once you're over 18. - Check out Headstart - You can develop skills and gain experience to get ahead whilst volunteering in your local community. Plus you’ll get an interview for a part-time job with a leading employer. - If you are aged 17 or 18 this August, check out Step Forward, our 12 month paid school leavers’ programme.
The NCS Team - The Challenge
For more info, click on the link below: http://www.ncsthechallenge.org/programme/
